description:
Standing before the The White Road Gate is Captain Gin Ichimaru of the Third Company.  Unaware that Gin is a Soul Reaper Captain, Ichigo sets upon him, ignoring Yoruichi`s warnings.  Upon hearing Ichigo`s name, Gin draws his Zanpakuto and attacks, forcing Ichigo to use Zangetsu to protect himself.  Unable to open the gates, disappointment fills the entourage.  Just then, the residents of Rukongai who had stayed hidden, come out onto the streets.
Source: crunchyroll
